channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice data type contains general information relating to an individual invoice applied to a SoftLayer customer account. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are taken from the account’s contact information at the time the invoice is generated. Local accountId The SoftLayer customer account that an invoice belongs to. Type: integer address1 The first line of an address belonging to an account at the time an invoice is created.
